headline: Is the most expensive lip balm always the best?
first_sentence: Lip care is big business in the UK, worth an estimated £80m and promoted by celebs like Charli XCX.

headline: Vitamin pills and icy swims: Can you really boost your immune system?
first_sentence: And I feel like I've left my sanity as well as my warm clothes in the changing room as I stride out to the edge of a reservoir in my swim shorts.
